ol.li: Login to the Horizon dashboard with your admin credentials (your credentials may vary from those in the following images).
Select Project → Compute → Volume, and then click the Create Volume button.

Set the following parameters when creating the new volume:
Volume Name: QNAP
Volume Source: No source, empty volume
Type: Qnap_ES_NAS
Availability Zone: Any Availability Zone
Click Create Volume
View your new volume in the Volumes tab to verify that it was created correctly.
Log in to your QNAP QES GUI. You can access the GUI at the QNAP management IP address. To verify that the new volume exists, click on the Storage Manager icon.
Select Storage Space → pool1. In the iSCSI LUN section, verify that QNAPis displayed in the list.
